title: Services - Graf Center for Integrative Medicine | Englewood Health
description: Our services are available to patients of Englewood Health as well as anyone who wants to take a proactive role in their own health.
cleaned_text: Our Services Our services are available to patients of Englewood Health as well as anyone who wants to take a proactive role in their own health. We can work with you to develop an integrative medicine treatment plan based on your needs and interests. If you are interested in sampling some of our services, check out our [calendar of Graf Center classes and events.](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=graf-center-for-integrative-medicine) These programs are often free or have a nominal cost, so it's a great introduction to experiencing the benefits of integrative medicine. Acupuncture Acupuncture involves the use of very fine needles placed at strategic points on your body. The Graf Center for Integrative Medicine offers [private acupuncture sessions](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/acupuncture) for a number of health issues and concerns, including chemotherapy-related or surgery-related nausea and vomiting; headaches and migraines; pain; menopause symptoms; anxiety, fatigue, depression, and sleep disturbances; reducing nicotine cravings; immune system support and seasonal allergies; and control of appetite and cravings to support weight loss goals. Aromatherapy Essential oils can support healing and relaxation. We offer [aromatherapy workshops](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/aromatherapy) and demonstrations and sell oils and aromatherapy supplies in our [retail boutique](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/retail-boutique). Consultations with Our Medical Director Integrative medical [consultations](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/consultations-with-our-medical-director) with our medical director aim to identify underlying causes of illness rather than just managing the symptoms. Holistic Nutrition Counseling Our registered dietitian and holistic nutritionist are available for [nutrition counseling sessions](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/holistic-nutritional-counseling). We will teach you ways to eat healthfully during treatment for cancer or other conditions. If you're not in treatment, we can evaluate your diet and work with you to eat in ways that support your health and energy. Massage Therapy and Reiki [Massage therapy](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/massage-therapy) can be used with traditional medical treatment for many conditions. We offer Swedish, therapeutic, deep tissue, and neuromuscular massages, as well as Reiki. If you are undergoing cancer treatment or have lymphedema, we have special massage techniques to help you with your symptoms. We also offer massages to new and expecting mothers, including in the safety of their own hospital room. Maternal Health If you are pregnant or a new mother, we have special [maternal health programs](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/maternal-health), including massage therapy, yoga, and meditation. Meditation and Stress Management We offer a number of [meditation classes and stress management workshops](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/meditation-and-stress-management), including a Mind-Body Stress Reduction series, weekly meditation classes, and other programs, all part of our Rodgers Family Meditation Program. Smoking Cessation Our [smoking cessation program](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/smoking-cessation) will teach you strategies to commit to quitting smoking. We offer acupuncture and guided meditation as part of our smoking cessation services. Wellness Coaching Those interested in partnering with a wellness coach can now find one at the Graf Center for Integrative Medicine. [Wellness coaching](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/wellness-coaching) is tailored to your unique goals and needs. When and how long you meet with your coach is determined by your scheduling needs and what you hope to accomplish. Yoga and Body Movement Designed for all levels, yoga at the Graf Center uses gentle poses, breathing, and imagery. Many of our [yoga and body movement classes](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine/our-services/yoga-and-body-movement) are designed for people facing certain health issues, and we take special care in ensuring your safety and comfort.
